section.title: openedx.core.djangoapps.credentials.api module
section.paragraph: Python APIs exposed by the credentials app to other in-process apps.

desc_content.paragraph: A utility function wrapping the is_learner_issurance_enabled utility function of the CredentialsApiConfig model. Intended to be an easier to read/grok utility function that informs the caller if use of the Credentials IDA is enabled for this Open edX instance.
Bases: AppConfig
Configuration class for credentials Django app
Override this method in subclasses to run code when Django starts.

section.title: openedx.core.djangoapps.credentials.signals module
section.paragraph: This file contains signal handlers for credentials-related functionality.

desc_content.paragraph: Notifies the Credentials IDA about certain grades it needs for its records, when a cert changes.
Notifies the Credentials IDA about certain grades it needs for its records, when a grade changes.

section.title: openedx.core.djangoapps.credentials.utils module
section.paragraph: Helper functions for working with Credentials.

desc_content.paragraph: Given a user, get credentials earned from the credentials service.

field_body.paragraph: user (User) – The user to authenticate as when requesting credentials.

list_item.paragraph: program_uuid (str) – UUID of the program whose credential to retrieve.
credential_type (str) – Which type of credentials to return (course-run or program)
raise_on_error (bool) – Reraise errors back to the caller, instead if returning empty results.

field_body.paragraph: list of dict, representing credentials returned by the Credentials service.

desc_content.paragraph: Returns a credentials API base URL.

field_body.paragraph: org (str) – Optional organization to look up the site config for, rather than the current request

desc_content.paragraph: Returns an authenticated Credentials API client.

field_body.paragraph: user (User) – The user to authenticate as when requesting credentials.

desc_content.paragraph: Returns a URL for a given records page (or general records list if given no UUID). May return None if this feature is disabled.

field_body.paragraph: program_uuid (str) – Optional program uuid to link for a program records URL

section.title: Module contents
section.paragraph: This package will be used as a wrapper for interacting with the credentials service.
